trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i metodi chiamati durante la generazione del contratto che pu√≤ essere usata per modificare il codice generato per un contratto di servizio.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IServiceContractGenerationExtension interface on a contract behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: Implementare l'interfaccia IServiceContractGenerationExtension in un comportamento del contratto (un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>tipo) che consente di modificare il codice generato quando un contratto o un endpoint viene compilato nel codice.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom contract behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In genere, un personalizzata <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>inserisce un comportamento del contratto personalizzato nella <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>raccolta durante la chiamata a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: Implementazione per modificare il modello a oggetti documento codice prima del processo di generazione del contratto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName> to modify the contract, operations, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> prior to code generation.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName>per modificare il contratto, le operazioni o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName>prima della generazione di codice.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The code generated context to use to modify the code document prior to generation.
trans-unit.target: Contesto da utilizzare per modificare il documento di codice prima della generazione di generare il codice.
